pages.text: The stomach is an essential part to any body. It works like a coal generator in any typical tech mod, except that it doesn't stop when it's full. It provides calories for the blood stream to extract and use in any other purpose. It's capacity and absorption ability is determined by it's health.

pages.title: Stomach
pages.text: Stomachs are dropped from living entities when killed with a scalpel in either the off-hand or main-hand. It's health is determined by the maximum health of the parent entity. Kill villagers or other players for a decent early-game solution

pages.title: Small Intestine
pages.text: Like stomachs, small intestines are dropped from living entities when killed with a scalpel in either the off-hand or main-hand.

pages.title: Digestor
pages.text: Required to allow the small intestine and stomach to digest food. It runs as long as it gets oxygen.
